conbody.p:
The Message
tool:
allows you to communicate effectively with project members.
allows you to send both private and public messages to other project members.
contains and safeguards all communications.

p.note: You must have access to the Message tool to receive messages. Access can only be granted by a project administrator.
Project administrators can also enable email forwarding for a specific email address. This allows to send an email to the specific email address and display the email in Bricsys 24/7.
